title: The Dragon Bone Flute
description: No one in Elzibeth's village has seen any sign of a dragon in generations, yet they still have the good sense not to wander too close to the Dragon's Cave for fear of stirring up old trouble. Three bullies challenge her to seek the cave place out, and though the last man who went there never returned, she must accept this task or risk losing her music forever. Returning to her village with a small bone as proof, Elzibeth learns that the magic of dragons is more than skin deep...
author: M. Todd Gallowglas
